generic.useeNoAccount: %s, you do not have a broadcast station!
generic.userNoAccount: %s, %s does not have a broadcast station!
generic.invalidID: %s, %s is not a valid user id or mention!
generic.cooldownMessage: Your frequency is too high please lower it!
generic.cannotDoToBots: %s, this action is not supported on bots!
generic.cannotDoToSelf: %s, this action is not supported on yourself!
generic.userUnknown: %s, The user %s has never tuned into the Tower's singals.

ping.description: No one asks how the bot is, only ping?
ping.fullDescription: Ask the bot to reply with 'Pong!'

create.logError: : Account could not be created for %s
create.success: %s, your account has been created! You are ready to broadcast!
create.error: %s, there was an error creating your account, please try again later. If this message persists contact Hal.
create.description: Create a station with the Tower to start broadcasting.
create.fullDescription: Create an account to use the bot's features.

close.success: %s, your account has been closed! The airwaves will miss your broadcasts.
close.error: %s, there was an error closing your account, please try again later.
close.confirmation: %s, are you sure you want to close your account? Confirm with: `%d`, cancel with `cancel`
close.cancelled: %s, you have cancelled the closure of your broadcast station.
close.wrongCode: %s, that was not the confirmation code. Closing cancelled.
close.timeout: No repsonse recieved in time `10s` from %s, account closure cancelled.
close.description: Close up your station and taek down your antenna
close.fullDescription: Close your account to stop using the bot's features

follow.FollowerBlocked: %s, has blocked you %s, you cannot follow them!
follow.followeeBlocked: %s, you blocked %s, you cannot follow them!
follow.success: %s, you are now tuned into %s's broadcasts!
follow.error: %s, there was an error tunining into %s's broadcasts, please try again later.
follow.already: %s, you are already tuned into %s's broadcasts!
follow.fullDescription: Follow a user to recieve their posts.

unfollow.success: %s, you are no longer following %s's broadcasts!
unfollow.error: %s, there was an error unfollowing %s, please try again later.
unfollow.blocked: %s, you were blocked by %s, as a result you were removed from their followers.
unfollow.fullDescription: Unfollow a user to stop getting their posts.

block.error: %s, there was an error blocking %s, please try again later.
block.description: Block a user to prevent them following you, also prevents you from following them.
block.fullDescription: Block a user to prevent them following you, also prevents you from following them.

unblock.success: %s, you have unblocked %s! They may now follow you if they have not blocked you
unblock.error: %s, there was an error unblocking %s, please try again later.
unblock.description: Unblocks a user allowing you to follow each other
unblock.fullDescription: Unblocks a user allowing you to follow each other

tagline.current: %s, your current tagline is: %s, set a new one with `b.edit tagline <text>`
tagline.isTooLong: %s, sorry that's too long to be your tagline (limit is 140 characters).
tagline.isProfane: %s, you cannot have profanity in your tagline!
tagline.success: %s, your tagline is now set to: %s
tagline.error: %s, there was an error setting your tagline, please try again later.
tagline.description: Provide a brief descritption of your station.
tagline.fullDescription: View/set your tagline on your profile card.
tagline.usage: `b.tagline` to view current, `b.tagline text` to set new

bio.isTooLong: %s, sorry that's too long to be your bio (limit is 400 characters).
bio.setSuccess: %s, your bio is now set to: %s
bio.setError: %s, there was an error setting your bio, please try again later.
bio.description: Provide a brief descritption of your station.
bio.fullDescription: View/set your tagline on your profile card.
bio.usage: `b.tagline` to view current, `b.tagline text` to set new

mature.current: %s, your mature preference is set to `%s`.
mature.setSuccess: %s, your mature preference is now set to `%s`.
mature.setError: %s, there was an error setting your mature preference.
mature.fullDescription: Set your mature preference i.e. do you want to send/recieve broadcasts with some profanity

profile.description: View your profile or a users profile.
profile.fullDescription: View your profile or a users profile.

clearDMs.description: Clears up to 50 posts from the bot in DMs
clearDMs.fullDescription: Clears up to 50 posts from the bot in DMs

list.notAlist: %s, list must be one of following, followers, blocked
list.description: Displays a list of the users you are following, are following you, or you have blocked.
list.fullDescription: Displays a list of the users you are following, are following you, or you have blocked.

post.noNonPrinting: Heck off with your non-printing characters %s tyvm.
post.description: Send a post to your followers!
post.fullDescription: Send a post to your followers, no blank posts, certain profanity prohibited.
post.usage: `b.post I just got my first Chicken Royale!`

help.description: Use with a command name to det more information about the command.
help.fullDescription: Use as `b.help` for a list of commands, use as `b.help commandname` for details on that command.
